00046 #define CRLF "\r\n"
00047 #define NL   "\n"
00048 
00049 struct ccnd_stats {
00050     long total_interest_counts;
00051     long total_flood_control;      /* done propagating, still recorded */
00052 };
00053 
00054 static int ccnd_collect_stats(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct ccnd_stats *ans);
00055 static struct ccn_charbuf *collect_stats_html(struct ccnd_handle *h);
00056 static void send_http_response(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face,
00057                                const char *mime_type,
00058                                struct ccn_charbuf *response);

00062 /* HTTP */
00063 
00064 static const char *resp404 =
00065     "HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found" CRLF
00066     "Connection: close" CRLF CRLF;
00067 
00068 static const char *resp405 =
00069     "HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed" CRLF
00070     "Connection: close" CRLF CRLF;
00071 
00072 static void
00073 ccnd_stats_http_set_debug(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face, int level)
00074 {
00075     struct ccn_charbuf *response = ccn_charbuf_create();
00076     
00077     h->debug = 1;
00078     ccnd_msg(h, "CCND_DEBUG=%d", level);
00079     h->debug = level;
00080     ccn_charbuf_putf(response, "<title>CCND_DEBUG=%d</title><tt>CCND_DEBUG=%d</tt>" CRLF, level, level);
00081     send_http_response(h, face, "text/html", response);
00082     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&response);
00083 }
00084 
00085 int
00086 ccnd_stats_handle_http_connection(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face)
00087 {
00088     struct ccn_charbuf *response = NULL;
00089     char rbuf[16];
00090     int i;
00091     int nspace;
00092     int n;
00093     
00094     if (face->inbuf->length < 4)
00095         return(-1);
00096     if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_NOSEND) != 0) {
00097         ccnd_destroy_face(h, face->faceid);
00098         return(-1);
00099     }
00100     n = sizeof(rbuf) - 1;
00101     if (face->inbuf->length < n)
00102         n = face->inbuf->length;
00103     for (i = 0, nspace = 0; i < n && nspace < 2; i++) {
00104         rbuf[i] = face->inbuf->buf[i];
00105         if (rbuf[i] == ' ')
00106             nspace++;
00107     }
00108     rbuf[i] = 0;
00109     if (nspace < 2 && i < sizeof(rbuf) - 1)
00110         return(-1);
00111     if (0 == strcmp(rbuf, "GET / ") ||
00112         0 == strcmp(rbuf, "GET /? ")) {
00113         response = collect_stats_html(h);
00114         send_http_response(h, face, "text/html", response);
00115     }
00116     else if (0 == strcmp(rbuf, "GET /?l=none ")) {
00117         ccnd_stats_http_set_debug(h, face, 0);
00118     }
00119     else if (0 == strcmp(rbuf, "GET /?l=low ")) {
00120         ccnd_stats_http_set_debug(h, face, 1);
00121     }
00122     else if (0 == strcmp(rbuf, "GET /?l=co ")) {
00123         ccnd_stats_http_set_debug(h, face, 4);
00124     }
00125     else if (0 == strcmp(rbuf, "GET /?l=med ")) {
00126         ccnd_stats_http_set_debug(h, face, 71);
00127     }
00128     else if (0 == strcmp(rbuf, "GET /?l=high ")) {
00129         ccnd_stats_http_set_debug(h, face, -1);
00130     }
00131     else if (0 == strcmp(rbuf, "GET /?f=xml ")) {
00132         response = collect_stats_xml(h);
00133         send_http_response(h, face, "text/xml", response);
00134     }
00135     else if (0 == strcmp(rbuf, "GET "))
00136         ccnd_send(h, face, resp404, strlen(resp404));
00137     else
00138         ccnd_send(h, face, resp405, strlen(resp405));
00139     face->flags |= (CCN_FACE_NOSEND | CCN_FACE_CLOSING);
00140     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&response);
00141     return(0);
00142 }
00143 
00144 static void
00145 send_http_response(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face,
00146                    const char *mime_type, struct ccn_charbuf *response)
00147 {
00148     struct linger linger = { .l_onoff = 1, .l_linger = 1 };
00149     char buf[128];
00150     int hdrlen;
00151 
00152     /* Set linger to prevent quickly resetting the connection on close.*/
00153     setsockopt(face->recv_fd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_LINGER, &linger, sizeof(linger));
00154     hdrlen = snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf),
00155                       "HTTP/1.1 200 OK" CRLF
00156                       "Content-Type: %s; charset=utf-8" CRLF
00157                       "Connection: close" CRLF
00158                       "Content-Length: %jd" CRLF CRLF,
00159                       mime_type,
00160                       (intmax_t)response->length);
00161     ccnd_send(h, face, buf, hdrlen);
00162     ccnd_send(h, face, response->buf, response->length);
00163 }
00164 
00165 /* Common statistics collection */
00166 
00167 static int
00168 ccnd_collect_stats(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct ccnd_stats *ans)
00169 {
00170     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
00171     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
00172     long sum;
00173     unsigned i;
00174     for (sum = 0, hashtb_start(h->nameprefix_tab, e);
00175          e->data != NULL; hashtb_next(e)) {
00176         struct nameprefix_entry *npe = e->data;
00177         struct propagating_entry *head = &npe->pe_head;
00178         struct propagating_entry *p;
00179         for (p = head->next; p != head; p = p->next) {
00180             if (ccnd_face_from_faceid(h, p->faceid) != NULL)
00181                 sum += 1;
00182         }
00183     }
00184     ans->total_interest_counts = sum;
00185     hashtb_end(e);
00186     for (sum = 0, hashtb_start(h->propagating_tab, e);
00187          e->data != NULL; hashtb_next(e)) {
00188         struct propagating_entry *pe = e->data;
00189         if (pe->interest_msg == NULL)
00190             sum += 1;
00191     }
00192     ans->total_flood_control = sum;
00193     hashtb_end(e);
00194     /* Do a consistency check on pending interest counts */
00195     for (sum = 0, i = 0; i < h->face_limit; i++) {
00196         struct face *face = h->faces_by_faceid[i];
00197         if (face != NULL)
00198             sum += face->pending_interests;
00199     }
00200     if (sum != ans->total_interest_counts)
00201         ccnd_msg(h, "ccnd_collect_stats found inconsistency %ld != %ld\n",
00202                  (long)sum, (long)ans->total_interest_counts);
00203     ans->total_interest_counts = sum;
00204     return(0);
00205 }
00206 
00207 /* HTML formatting */
00208 
00209 static void
00210 collect_faces_html(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct ccn_charbuf *b)
00211 {
00212     int i;
00213     struct ccn_charbuf *nodebuf;
00214     int port;
00215     
00216     nodebuf = ccn_charbuf_create();
00217     ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "<h4>Faces</h4>" NL);
00218     ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "<ul>");
00219     for (i = 0; i < h->face_limit; i++) {
00220         struct face *face = h->faces_by_faceid[i];
00221         if (face != NULL && (face->flags & CCN_FACE_UNDECIDED) == 0) {
00222             ccn_charbuf_putf(b, " <li>");
00223             ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "<b>face:</b> %u <b>flags:</b> 0x%x",
00224                              face->faceid, face->flags);
00225             ccn_charbuf_putf(b, " <b>pending:</b> %d",
00226                              face->pending_interests);
00227             if (face->recvcount != 0)
00228                 ccn_charbuf_putf(b, " <b>activity:</b> %d",
00229                                  face->recvcount);
00230             nodebuf->length = 0;
00231             port = ccn_charbuf_append_sockaddr(nodebuf, face->addr);
00232             if (port > 0) {
00233                 const char *node = ccn_charbuf_as_string(nodebuf);
00234                 int chk = CCN_FACE_MCAST | CCN_FACE_UNDECIDED |
00235                 CCN_FACE_NOSEND | CCN_FACE_GG | CCN_FACE_PASSIVE;
00236                 if ((face->flags & chk) == 0)
00237                     ccn_charbuf_putf(b,
00238                                      " <b>remote:</b> "
00239                                      "<a href='http://%s:%s/'>"
00240                                      "%s:%d</a>",
00241                                      node, CCN_DEFAULT_UNICAST_PORT,
00242                                      node, port);
00243                 else if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_PASSIVE) == 0)
00244                     ccn_charbuf_putf(b, " <b>remote:</b> %s:%d",
00245                                      node, port);
00246                 else
00247                     ccn_charbuf_putf(b, " <b>local:</b> %s:%d",
00248                                      node, port);
00249                 if (face->sendface != face->faceid &&
00250                     face->sendface != CCN_NOFACEID)
00251                     ccn_charbuf_putf(b, " <b>via:</b> %u", face->sendface);
00252             }
00253             ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "</li>" NL);
00254         }
00255     }
00256     ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "</ul>");
00257     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&nodebuf);
00258 }
00259 
00260 static void
00261 collect_forwarding_html(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct ccn_charbuf *b)
00262 {
00263     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
00264     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
00265     struct ccn_forwarding *f;
00266     int res;
00267     struct ccn_charbuf *name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00268     
00269     ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "<h4>Forwarding</h4>" NL);
00270     ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "<ul>");
00271     hashtb_start(h->nameprefix_tab, e);
00272     for (; e->data != NULL; hashtb_next(e)) {
00273         struct nameprefix_entry *ipe = e->data;
00274         ccn_name_init(name);
00275         res = ccn_name_append_components(name, e->key, 0, e->keysize);
00276         if (res < 0)
00277             abort();
00278         if (0) {
00279             ccn_charbuf_putf(b, " <li>");
00280             ccn_uri_append(b, name->buf, name->length, 1);
00281             ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "</li>" NL);
00282         }
00283         for (f = ipe->forwarding; f != NULL; f = f->next) {
00284             if ((f->flags & CCN_FORW_ACTIVE) != 0) {
00285                 ccn_name_init(name);
00286                 res = ccn_name_append_components(name, e->key, 0, e->keysize);
00287                 ccn_charbuf_putf(b, " <li>");
00288                 ccn_uri_append(b, name->buf, name->length, 1);
00289                 ccn_charbuf_putf(b,
00290                                  " <b>face:</b> %u"
00291                                  " <b>flags:</b> 0x%x"
00292                                  " <b>expires:</b> %d",
00293                                  f->faceid, f->flags, f->expires);
00294                 ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "</li>" NL);
00295             }
00296         }
00297     }
00298     hashtb_end(e);
00299     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00300     ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "</ul>");
00301 }
00302 
00303 static unsigned
00304 ccnd_colorhash(struct ccnd_handle *h)
00305 {
00306     unsigned const char *a = h->ccnd_id;
00307     unsigned v;
00308     
00309     v = (a[0] << 16) + (a[1] << 8) + a[2];
00310     return (v | 0xC0C0C0);
00311 }
00312 
00313 static struct ccn_charbuf *
00314 collect_stats_html(struct ccnd_handle *h)
00315 {
00316     struct ccnd_stats stats = {0};
00317     struct ccn_charbuf *b = ccn_charbuf_create();
00318     int pid;
00319     struct utsname un;
00320     const char *portstr;
00321     
00322     portstr = getenv(CCN_LOCAL_PORT_ENVNAME);
00323     if (portstr == NULL || portstr[0] == 0 || strlen(portstr) > 10)
00324         portstr = CCN_DEFAULT_UNICAST_PORT;
00325     uname(&un);
00326     pid = getpid();
00327     
00328     ccnd_collect_stats(h, &stats);
00329     ccn_charbuf_putf(b,
00330         "<html xmlns='http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml'>"
00331         "<head>"
00332         "<title>%s ccnd[%d]</title>"
00333         //"<meta http-equiv='refresh' content='3'>"
00334         "<style type='text/css'>"
00335         "/*<![CDATA[*/"
00336         "p.header {color: white; background-color: blue; width: 100%%}"
00337         "/*]]>*/"
00338         "</style>"
00339         "</head>" NL
00340         "<body bgcolor='#%06X'>"
00341         "<p class='header'>%s ccnd[%d] local port %s</p>" NL
00342         "<div><b>Content items:</b> %llu accessioned,"
00343         " %d stored, %lu stale, %d sparse, %lu duplicate, %lu sent</div>" NL
00344         "<div><b>Interests:</b> %d names,"
00345         " %ld pending, %ld propagating, %ld noted</div>" NL
00346         "<div><b>Interest totals:</b> %lu accepted,"
00347         " %lu dropped, %lu sent, %lu stuffed</div>" NL,
00348         un.nodename,
00349         pid,
00350         ccnd_colorhash(h),
00351         un.nodename,
00352         pid,
00353         portstr,
00354         (unsigned long long)h->accession,
00355         hashtb_n(h->content_tab),
00356         h->n_stale,
00357         hashtb_n(h->sparse_straggler_tab),
00358         h->content_dups_recvd,
00359         h->content_items_sent,
00360         hashtb_n(h->nameprefix_tab), stats.total_interest_counts,
00361         hashtb_n(h->propagating_tab) - stats.total_flood_control,
00362         stats.total_flood_control,
00363         h->interests_accepted, h->interests_dropped,
00364         h->interests_sent, h->interests_stuffed);
00365     if (0)
00366         ccn_charbuf_putf(b,
00367                          "<div><b>Active faces and listeners:</b> %d</div>" NL,
00368                          hashtb_n(h->faces_by_fd) + hashtb_n(h->dgram_faces));
00369     collect_faces_html(h, b);
00370     collect_forwarding_html(h, b);
00371     ccn_charbuf_putf(b,
00372         "</body>"
00373         "</html>" NL);
00374     return(b);
00375 }
00376 
00377 /* XML formatting */
00378 
00379 static void
00380 collect_faces_xml(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct ccn_charbuf *b)
00381 {
00382     int i;
00383     struct ccn_charbuf *nodebuf;
00384     int port;
00385     
00386     nodebuf = ccn_charbuf_create();
00387     ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "<faces>");
00388     for (i = 0; i < h->face_limit; i++) {
00389         struct face *face = h->faces_by_faceid[i];
00390         if (face != NULL && (face->flags & CCN_FACE_UNDECIDED) == 0) {
00391             ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "<face>");
00392             ccn_charbuf_putf(b,
00393                              "<faceid>%u</faceid>"
00394                              "<faceflags>%04x</faceflags>",
00395                              face->faceid, face->flags);
00396             ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "<pending>%d</pending>",
00397                              face->pending_interests);
00398             ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "<recvcount>%d</recvcount>",
00399                              face->recvcount);
00400             nodebuf->length = 0;
00401             port = ccn_charbuf_append_sockaddr(nodebuf, face->addr);
00402             if (port > 0) {
00403                 const char *node = ccn_charbuf_as_string(nodebuf);
00404                 ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "<ip>%s:%d</ip>", node, port);
00405             }
00406             if (face->sendface != face->faceid &&
00407                 face->sendface != CCN_NOFACEID)
00408                 ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "<via>%u</via>", face->sendface);
00409             ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "</face>" NL);
00410         }
00411     }
00412     ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "</faces>");
00413     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&nodebuf);
00414 }
00415 
00416 static void
00417 collect_forwarding_xml(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct ccn_charbuf *b)
00418 {
00419     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
00420     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
00421     struct ccn_forwarding *f;
00422     int res;
00423     struct ccn_charbuf *name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00424     
00425     ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "<forwarding>");
00426     hashtb_start(h->nameprefix_tab, e);
00427     for (; e->data != NULL; hashtb_next(e)) {
00428         struct nameprefix_entry *ipe = e->data;
00429         for (f = ipe->forwarding, res = 0; f != NULL && !res; f = f->next) {
00430             if ((f->flags & CCN_FORW_ACTIVE) != 0)
00431                 res = 1;
00432         }
00433         if (res) {
00434             ccn_name_init(name);
00435             res = ccn_name_append_components(name, e->key, 0, e->keysize);
00436             ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "<fentry>");
00437             ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "<prefix>");
00438             ccn_uri_append(b, name->buf, name->length, 1);
00439             ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "</prefix>");
00440             for (f = ipe->forwarding; f != NULL; f = f->next) {
00441                 if ((f->flags & CCN_FORW_ACTIVE) != 0) {
00442                     ccn_charbuf_putf(b,
00443                                      "<dest>"
00444                                      "<faceid>%u</faceid>"
00445                                      "<flags>%x</flags>"
00446                                      "<expires>%d</expires>"
00447                                      "</dest>",
00448                                      f->faceid, f->flags, f->expires);
00449                 }
00450             }
00451             ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "</fentry>");
00452         }
00453     }
00454     hashtb_end(e);
00455     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00456     ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "</forwarding>");
00457 }
00458 
00459 static struct ccn_charbuf *
00460 collect_stats_xml(struct ccnd_handle *h)
00461 {
00462     struct ccnd_stats stats = {0};
00463     struct ccn_charbuf *b = ccn_charbuf_create();
00464         
00465     ccnd_collect_stats(h, &stats);
00466     ccn_charbuf_putf(b,
00467         "<ccnd>"
00468         "<cobs>"
00469         "<accessioned>%llu</accessioned>"
00470         "<stored>%d</stored>"
00471         "<stale>%lu</stale>"
00472         "<sparse>%d</sparse>"
00473         "<duplicate>%lu</duplicate>"
00474         "<sent>%lu</sent>"
00475         "</cobs>"
00476         "<interests>"
00477         "<names>%d</names>"
00478         "<pending>%ld</pending>"
00479         "<propagating>%ld</propagating>"
00480         "<noted>%ld</noted>"
00481         "<accepted>%lu</accepted>"
00482         "<dropped>%lu</dropped>"
00483         "<sent>%lu</sent>"
00484         "<stuffed>%lu</stuffed>"
00485         "</interests>",
00486         (unsigned long long)h->accession,
00487         hashtb_n(h->content_tab),
00488         h->n_stale,
00489         hashtb_n(h->sparse_straggler_tab),
00490         h->content_dups_recvd,
00491         h->content_items_sent,
00492         hashtb_n(h->nameprefix_tab), stats.total_interest_counts,
00493         hashtb_n(h->propagating_tab) - stats.total_flood_control,
00494         stats.total_flood_control,
00495         h->interests_accepted, h->interests_dropped,
00496         h->interests_sent, h->interests_stuffed);
00497     collect_faces_xml(h, b);
00498     collect_forwarding_xml(h, b);
00499     ccn_charbuf_putf(b, "</ccnd>" NL);
00500     return(b);
00501 }
